channel.title: virtio on Pälzer
channel.description: Recent content in virtio on Pälzer

item.title: query and control virtio version
item.description: virtio: modern/legacy = ??? a.k.a puzzlement about inquiring or controlling virtio revisions via libvirt When looking around how to check for the current setting of modern/legacy virtio, or how to control it via libvirt I only found dead ends at first. If you search how to get some info about it you will find query-virtio/info virtio, but after 5 versions being discussed nothing is merged still. If instead you search how to better control the version you’ll find virtio revision, but also 5 versions discussed until declared postponed.
